attributes.additional_details: This is Bluey's story: " one day, I got told I'm a bad breed and I got taken from my family! They paid £££ to get me back. But now I get muzzled when I want to go walks! I kiss not bite! I get stared at and sometimes stopped by policemen who are nasty to me and my mummy! I don't like this and I want it to end! Can you help me be free like the other doggies!" He is a Pitbull cross and is discriminated for his looks!
attributes.background: This is Bentleys story: " I died this week, the police said  I looked wrong, said I looked like a Pitbull! So I got put down! Now my family miss me and I miss them and it's all BSL's fault" this poor Pitbull got killed for his looks!

rejection.details:
If you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take action, you will need to start a new petition which asks clearly for the action that you would like. This needs to be on something that the UK Government or Parliament is responsible for.

You will also need to give your full, real name.
